WorkGoalLink.name: WorkGoalLink
WorkGoalLink.description: Represents the relationship between two goals (many to many relationship).

IsActive.description: Whether the WorkGoalLink is active (true) or not (false)

Name.description: The auto-generated name of the goal link

SourceGoalId.description: The ID of the source WorkGoal object

TargetGoalId.description: The ID of the target WorkGoal object
